page.topic: How to set an Argument's Value at Run-time in a UX Component

discussion.p: If a UX Component is configured to have [arguments], you can change the argument value at run-time using an Ajax Callback.

description.p: Make an Ajax Callback, either using the [{dialog.object}.ajaxCallback()] or [Ajax Callback Action Javascript] action.
In the Xbasic function that handles the callback, add the following Xbasic:
Where *[xb:argName]* is the name of the argument and *[xb:argValue]* is the value to set.

step.example:
argName = "Name of argument" argValue = "value to set"
e.arguments.set(argName, argValue)
